text | A bush worth of sharp leaves swirls around the foe making it harder for it to aim attacks properly.

title: Leafage
contents: text | The user throws leaf darts towards its foe.

title: Leech Life
contents: property | Added Effect | The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.
text | The user attacks a vital spot and sucks away the vitality of its foe.

title: Leech Seed
contents: property | Added Effect | If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, Roll 1 Dice of Damage to the foe. User heals for 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. Grass Type Pokemon are immune to this Move. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.

title: Leer
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the Defense of those affected.
text | A vicious glare that will make any opponent doubt its own strength in battle.

title: Lick
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.
text | The user licks the foe. The saliva can numb the body of most creatures.

title: Life Dew
contents: property | Added Effect | If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. User and Allies in Range heal 1 HP at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | The user creates a fresh-water dew that makes it and its allies full of energy.

title: Light Of Ruin
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Recoil. -1 Accuracy.
text | By drawing energy from the Eternal Flower, the Pokemon unleashes all of its hurt. A beautiful light surrounds the area, yet the pain inside of its heart remains.

title: Light Screen
contents: property | Added Effect | User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Special Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating walls and floors of light that help prevent the passing of energies.

title: Liquidation
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.
text | The Pokemon gets close to its foe then strikes while bursting a full-force blast of pressurized water, the water may cut or dent through the foe's armor.

title: Lock-On
contents: property | Added Effect | The next attack the user performs has 2 automatic unremovable successes on its Accuracy Roll.
text | The Pokemon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.

title: Lovely Kiss
contents: property | Added Effect | Put the Target to Sleep.
text | The Pokemon approaches the foe with a kiss. Its ugly face and awful smooch make the poor creature faint in terror.

title: Low Kick
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way.
text | The user kicks the target making it fall, the bigger the foe the harder the fall.

title: Low Sweep
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Foe's Dexterity by 2.
text | The Pokemon strikes the foe's legs, leaving it unable to walk normally or run.

title: Lucky Chant
contents: property | Added Effect | User and Allies in range can re-roll one un-successful die from all their rolls until the end of the scene. If an opponent would land a Critical Hit it doesn't. Outside of battle good things happen at the story tellers discretion.
text | The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this Pokemon and its allies divine protection.

title: Lunar Dance
contents: property | Added Effect | The user Faints. One fallen Ally regains consciousness, has its HP fully restored and all Status Ailments healed. If the Ally was not in-battle, it is called out and ready to fight.
text | The moon shines at the darkest hours, reflecting the sun's lifebringer light on those who fell into the night, taking pity on their lost souls.

title: Lunge
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce foe's Strength.
text | The user charges against the foe at full force, not just to knock it down but to restain it with its many limbs.

title: Luster Purge
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense. This Effect can be repeated up to 3 times per Target.
text | The user engulfs itself in a blinding light and shoots a beam at its foe. This light leaves the foe powerless to resist against anyone.

title: Mach Punch
contents: property | Added Effect | Fist Based. Priority 1.
text | The user launches a punch so quickly that it's barely seen.

title: Magic Coat
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 4. Redirect the effects of a Support Move that would affect the user or its side of the battlefield towards the foe's (ie. The foe used Stealth Rock, with Magic Coat it will now affect the foe's side instead of yours).
text | The user quickly creates a barrier that reflects any minor attack, status condition, or dirty triick the foe might have wanted to use.

title: Magic Powder
contents: property | Added Effect | Change the target's Type to Psychic.
text | The Pokemon recites an enchantment and blows a cloud of pink dust on its Target. Afterwards, the target becomes especially good at guessing which card you got from a deck.

title: Magic Room
contents: property | Added Effect | No one can use their Held Item nor any other Item. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | Inside the effects of Magic Room, technology, tools, and items manually activated do not work. Automated technology will function as normal.

title: Magical Leaf
contents: text | The user sends out a floating leaf that will pursue the target until it hits.

title: Magma Storm
contents: property | Added Effect | Blocks. Roll 3 Damage Dice at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon shoots a fiery eruption to its foe. Unable to escape and surrounded by the unbearable heat the foe's survival is at risk.

title: Magnet Bomb
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Never Fail.
text | The Pokemon hurls a metal bomb that is attracted to the target like a magnet. The moment it touches the foe, it will explode.

title: Magnet Rise
contents: property | Added Effect | For the Next 4 Rounds the User gains immunity against Ground Type Moves.
text | The Pokemon uses the magnetic field of the earth to repel itself from the ground, allowing it to float for a short period of time.

title: Magnetic Flux
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the Defense and Sp. Defense of User and all its Electric and Steel Type Allies.
text | The Pokemon bends the magnetic field around itself, this also affects all allies who are sensible to it.

title: Magnitude
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. 1 Dice to determine this Move's Power
text | The user quakes the ground plates. Some plates will move easier than others.

title: Mat Block
contents: property | Added Effect | Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. This Move only works the first Round the User has been out.
text | The Pokemon uses a mat or something similar as a shield.

title: Me First
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 1. The User copies and uses the Move the target was intending to use. It must be a damaging Move.
text | The user anticipates the next attack so it can hit the target with an astounding speed.

title: Mean Look
contents: text | The Pokemon gives a menacing look that freezes the foe on the spot with intense fear.

title: Meditate
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength
text | The Pokemon meditates to unleash a power that's been sleeping deep inside the user.

title: Mega Drain
contents: property | Added Effect | The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
text | The user absorbs a big amount of vital energy from the target.

title: Mega Kick
contents: text | The Pokemon throws a mega powered kick to the foe's face.

title: Mega Punch
contents: text | The Pokemon throws a mega potent hook towards the foe's face.

title: Megahorn
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal Damage. -2 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon uses its strong horn(s) to pierce its foe and deal massive damage.

title: Memento
contents: property | Added Effect | The user faints. Reduce foe's Strength. Dexterity. Special. Defense and Sp. Defense by 2. Lasts for a whole scene.
text | The user unleashes all its remaining power to send a wave of hopeless thoughts to haunt the foe's mind and soul. The target will be left in grief.

title: Metal Burst
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move only works if the foe just used an attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice.
text | After receiving damage, the user bursts the tiny but sharp metal piece that came loose because of the foe's attack. The greater the impact the more metal it will shoot.

title: Metal Claw
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the user's Strength. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon attacks using its sharp claws, the friction may leave them even sharper.

title: Metal Sound
contents: property | Added Effect | Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special Defense by 2.
text | The user produces a horrible noise that impedes the foe from focusing on the fight, leaving it vulnerable to attacks.

title: Meteor Assault
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon will make an incredible jump to the sky, then lunge towards the foe at a staggering speed, crashing the ground upon impact. The user is left very tired.

title: Meteor Mash
contents: property | Added Effect | Fist Based. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user charges with a strong fist and strikes like a meteor.

title: Metronome
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll a dice to determine this move's power. The appearance and Type of this move are decided by the Storyteller.
text | The Pokemon waves its hands with rhythm. The energy around follows the cadence and manifests with an impressive attack.

title: Milk Drink
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate.
text | The Pokemon drinks a glass of its own milk. The rich taste and nutrients revitalize it.

title: Mimic
contents: property | Added Effect | Copies the last move the target used until the end of the scene. That move replaces Mimic.
text | Making use of its acting talents, the Pokemon imitates what the target just did.

title: Mind Blown
contents: property | Added Effect | Area Attack. Recoil.
text | The Pokemon has had a terrible day and has a very bad headache, try not to disturb its peace because its head feels like exploding.

title: Mind Reader
contents: property | Added Effect | This Pokemon gets 2 automatic successes on the next Accuracy Roll or Evasion Roll against the target.
text | The user reads the foe's mind. It knows exactly what to do next.

title: Minimize
contents: property | Added Effect | The User can now make up to 5 Evasions per Round.
text | The Pokemon compacts its body, appearing smaller than its normal size.

title: Miracle Eye
contents: property | Added Effect | The User may hit Dark Type Pokemon with Psychic Moves. The Pokemon ignores Evasion modifiers. Opponents can't reduce the User's Accuracy.
text | The user's sight transcends the flesh and can look directly into the innermost mental pressence of everyone around. Hidden enemies can be detected.

title: Mirror Coat
contents: property | Added Effect | The move only works if the foe just used a Special Attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.
text | The user canalizes the damage received by energies and bounces them back to their source.

title: Mirror Move
contents: property | Added Effect | Copies the last Damaging Move the foe has performed.
text | The user concentrates and manages to imitate the last move used by the foe.

title: Mirror Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user dazes the foe with a beam of light. Those who have experienced it describe it as

title: Mist Ball
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Special. This Effect can be repeated up to 3 times per Target.
text | The user engulfs its foe with a cloud of mist. This soothing mist keeps evil intents from surfacing into the foe's mind.

title: Mist
contents: property | Added Effect | For the next 4 Rounds, the User and Allies cannot have their Attributes or Traits reduced.
text | The user cloaks itself and its allies within cold mist with mystic properties, it may conceal whoever is nearby.

title: Misty Terrain
contents: property | Added Effect | Creatures standing on the battlefield won't be affected by Status Ailments. Dragon Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | The user surrounds the battlefield with a mystical mist that feels protective. Mythical Pokemon find something eerie about it.

title: Moonblast
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Special.
text | Summon power directly from the moon. The Pokemon blasts the foe with light.

title: Moongeist Beam
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. If anything on the foe's side would prevent this move from dealing damage (Pokemon Type, Abilities, Shield Moves, Weather or Barriers) ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.
text | A cold reflection of the moon shines upon the target, it doesn't hurt physically but those who stare directly into the light simply collapse.

title: Moonlight
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. If performed at Night or Sunny Weather is in effect this move becomes a Complete Heal. If Rain/Sandstorm Weather is in effect this move only heals 1 HP
text | The user gathers power from the light of the moon, the energy absorbed can heal most injuries.

title: Morning Sun
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. Complete Heal during Sunny Weather. If Rain/Sandstorm Weather is in effect or it's night or you are indoors/underground this move only heals 1 HP.
text | The sun shines brightly on the Pokemon and makes it feel rejuvenated like early in the morning.

title: Mud Bomb
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon shoots a ball made of mud that bursts on the target, some mud may get on its eyes.

title: Mud Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the Foe's Dexterity.
text | The Pokemon shoots a stream of mud that covers the foe, obstructing its movement.

title: Mud Slap
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
text | The user hurls some mud to the face of the foe, leaving it unable to see clearly.

title: Mud Sport
contents: property | Added Effect | For the next 4 Rounds Electric Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.
text | The user covers everything with mud, reducing the effectiveness of electric attacks made on the field.

title: Muddy Water
contents: property | Added Effect | All Foes in Range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Accuracy of those affected. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user fills its mouth with dirt and spits a torrent of mud at the foes. This mud may get in the eyes of the enemies.

title: Multi-Attack
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.
text | A weird-looking Pokemon charged against its foes, the same attack releases different kinds of energy depending on the disk it was holding.

title: Mystical Fire
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Foe's Special.
text | This mystical fire not only burns the foe, it also drains its power.

title: Nasty Plot
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the user's Special by 2.
text | The Pokemon starts plotting on how to defeat the enemy. Its evil laugh reveals the bad intentions.

title: Natural Gift
contents: property | Added Effect | User loses its held berry. Ranged. See Natural Gift on p.432 for more info.
text | The user throws its berry at the foe. The results can be quite surprising.

title: Nature Power
contents: property | Added Effect | The type of this move is determined by the environment. See Nature Power p.432 for more info.
text | The Pokemon makes use of the terrain and asks the nature for aid in battle.

title: Nature's Madness
contents: property | Added Effect | Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 10) Rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1, this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses. -1 Accuracy.
text | The forces of nature attack as if they had a will of their own. Water will try to drown you, plants will trap you, lightning will come out of nowhere, and even your own body will fail you.

title: Needle Arm
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
text | The Pokemon hits the foe with its flailing arms, some thorns may get stuck on the target like needles.

title: Night Daze
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 4 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Accuracy.
text | The user forms a pitch black wave that hurts the foe. This darkness may remain obstructing the target's vision.

title: Night Shade
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank.  3 dice at Amateur Rank.  4 Dice at Ace Rank.  5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.
text | The user casts a shade with a frightening mirage inside that torments the target.

title: Night Slash
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. High Critical.
text | The user quickly slashes through the target as soon as it gets the chance. The intent to end the target's life is frightening.

title: Nightmare
contents: property | Added Effect | Will only work if the Target is asleep. Deal 1 Damage to the foe. Deal 1 Damage again at the beginning of each Round if the target is still asleep.
text | The user enters the target's dream to torment it.

title: No Retreat
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense. The user is now blocked.
text | No surrender. No retreat. Until victory always.

title: Noble Roar
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Strength and Special.
text | The Pokemon makes a roar that commands respect and authority over anyone listening.

title: Nuzzle
contents: property | Added Effect | Paralyze the foe.
text | The Pokemon rubs its electrified cheeks against the foe, it looks very cute but it can be dangerous.

title: Oblivion Wing
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. High Critical.
text | A dark wind rises, turning everything it touches into dust to be scattered until nothing remains. People, Pokemon, plants, everything fades until a distant memory.

title: Obstruct
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 4. Shield Move. * If the Foe used a Non-Ranged Physical Move against the user, Reduce the Foes Defense by 2. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.
text | In a reckless action, the user charges against the foe to stop its momentum and block its incoming attack. Being so close allows the user to reach for weak spots.

title: Octazooka
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user sprays ink at the target's face to obstruct its vison.

title: Octolock
contents: property | Added Effect | Block. Reduce the foe's Defense and Sp. Defense.
text | The user wraps its tentacles to immobilize the foe. Being so close enables the user to find weak spots.

title: Odor Sleuth
contents: property | Added Effect | The Foe can not Evade moves performed by the User. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types. Add all Successes from this Move to any Rolls to Track the target.
text | The Pokemon uses its keen smell to detect the foe.

title: Ominous Wind
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, and Sp. Defense.
text | The Pokemon sends out a goosebump-inducing, repulsive wind that might make the user feel an evil rush.

title: Origin Pulse
contents: text | The Pokemon sends a giant pulse underwater that creates a chain reaction and causes water to move in large streams. It is believed that all water in the sea moves thanks to this.

title: Outrage
contents: text | The user awakens their primal instinct as a dragon and unleashes its uncontrollable fury, destroying everything in its path. After that, the Pokemon is left disoriented and confused.

title: Overdrive
contents: property | Added Effect | All Foes in Range. Sound Based.
text | The Pokemon uses its own body as an amplifier for the energizing sounds it produces.

title: Overheat
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.
text | A furious wave of scorching fire that will turn to ashes everything it touches, exhausting the user afterwards.

title: Pain Split
contents: property | Added Effect | The user gives its Pain Penalizations to the foe. User ignores Pain Penalization effects on itself. For cannot ignore them with Will but it can still ignore its own Pain Penalizations. HP on both remains the same.
text | The user shares its pain with the foe. After a short while it becomes excruciating for the target.

title: Parabolic Charge
contents: property | Added Effect | The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt to one target, rounded down.
text | The Pokemon lets go of a big electric charge from its body. The charge comes back to it even bigger.

title: Parting Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce foe's Strength and Special. The user switches out, the new Pokemon arrives ready to fight. Roll for its initiative. Switcher Move.
text | The user threatens the foe, leaving it too scared to pursuit the user or overwhelm the ally that just switched in the battlefield.

title: Pay Day
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. At the end of the battle give Money to the Trainer Equal to its Rank: Starter/Beginner - $20.00 Amateur - $50.00 Ace - $75.00 Pro - $100.00
text | This move grants good fortune, making it more likely to get more money after each battle.

title: Payback
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool if the target already damaged you this Round.
text | The Pokemon tackles the target with hatred and vengeance.

title: Peck
contents: text | The Pokemon uses its beak or horn to jab the foe, hurting a little bit.

title: Perish Song
contents: property | Added Effect | After three rounds, if any Pokemon who heard the song is not removed from battle, it will receive its remaining HP as damage. Sound Based.
text | A song of mourning and despair that resonates on the minds of anyone who listens. Makes you feel like you are on your death bed.

title: Petal Blizzard
contents: text | The Pokemon showers the battlefield with a raging blizzard of petals and leaves, anyone close to the user will suffer the consequences.

title: Petal Dance
contents: text | The Pokemon starts swirling petals around in a true display of nature's power, the petals are guided by the wind to strike the foe.

title: Phantom Force
contents: property | Added Effect | Charge Move. While charging this Move, other Moves will not affect the user. If the Target made a Shielding Action the shield is destroyed and won't have any effect.
text | The Pokemon disappears into a dark dimension to infiltrate even the most impenetrable defenses. It may reappear during its next action.

title: Photon Geyser (Physical)
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user.
text | The Pokemon attacks with a large pillar of light that comes out from where its foe is standing, either the blazing energy  or the crushing strikes are enough to knock someone out.

title: Photon Geyser (Special)
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user.
text | The Pokemon attacks with a large pillar of light that comes out from where its foe is standing, either the blazing energy  or the crushing strikes are enough to knock someone out.

title: Photon Geyser
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user. If using Special then the move is considered Special instead of Physical.
text | The Pokemon attacks with a large pillar of light that comes out from where its foe is standing, either the blazing energy  or the crushing strikes are enough to knock someone out.

title: Pika Papow
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Die to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
text | The User lets out its energy in the form of a lightning strike, the happier the user feels the more energized it will be.

title: Pin Missile
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Successive Actions.
text | The Pokemon showers its foe with stings or spikes that pierce like needles.

title: Plasma Fists
contents: property | Added Effect | Fist Based. If successful, all Normal-Type Moves of the user will be considered Electric Type until the end of the Scene.
text | The user charges its fists with electricity, and upon impact the charge materializes into plasma that adds an electric element to all of its Normal moves.

title: Play Nice
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Strength.
text | The user starts playing with the foe in a friendly way. This makes the foe reconsider its aggressive demeanor.

title: Play Rough
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user and the foe start a playful wrestle, it soon escalates into something not so pretty.

title: Pluck
contents: property | Added Effect | If the Target is holding a Berry, the User eats it and gains its effects.
text | The user gives a hard peck and may get something tasty out of the foe.

title: Poison Fang
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 5 Chance Dice to Badly Poison the Foe.
text | The Pokemon bites the foe and injects its poison directly through its fangs. After that it just waits for the poison to slowly take care of its foe.

title: Poison Gas
contents: property | Added Effect | Poison those affected. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon releases a big cloud of toxic gas, anyone who takes a breath will start coughing violently. They should seek a doctor immediately.

title: Poison Jab
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
text | The Pokemon stabs its foe with a sting or tentacle drenched with venom.

title: Poison Powder
contents: property | Added Effect | Poison the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user scatters a small cloud of venomous dust that immediately causes coughing and fever.

title: Poison Sting
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Target.
text | The user shoots a small sting that injects venom into the foe.

title: Poison Tail
contents: property | Added Effect | High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
text | The tail of this Pokemon is sharp like a blade, it attacks with slashing movements and may release some poison through it.

title: Pollen Puff
contents: property | Added Effect | When this move is used against an ally it will heal 1 HP instead of dealing damage.
text | The Pokemon creates a puff of pollen that explodes on the foe's face and gives them a terrible allergy. When consumed these puffs are sweet and very nutritious.

title: Poltergeist
contents: property | Added Effect | Can only be used if the Target is Holding an Item or if Items have been used on the Target's side of the field.
text | The Pokemon's spirit possesses an Item and attacks with that cursed object. It is said that if the Pokemon lingers too long possessing an object, it'll have trouble getting out.

title: Pound
contents: text | A decent hit to smash the foes.

title: Powder Snow
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected.
text | The user sends out a wind current full of snowflakes that freeze whatever they touch. This powder can easily turn a room to ice.

title: Powder
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 3 Dice of Damage to the next Fire Type attack that hits the target.
text | The foe is fully covered with a flammable powder, a source of fire might ignite it with explosive results.

title: Power Gem
contents: text | The user attacks with a ray of light that comes out of the gem on its body.

title: Power Split
contents: property | Added Effect | Average the User's Strength and Special with the target.
text | The user employs its psychic power to average its capabilities with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of strength.

title: Power Swap
contents: property | Added Effect | Switch your Strength and Special with your foe.
text | The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like it's got your weaknesses and make the user feel like it's got the target's strength.

title: Power Trick
contents: property | Added Effect | Switch the User's Strength with its Defense and the User's Special with its Sp. Defense.
text | The user's mind is tricked into thinking that strength comes from their vitality, and their vitality is their power.

title: Power Trip
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move for every Attribute increase the user has. Up to 7 Dice may be added this way. (ie. the user has 2 increased points on Defense, add 2 Damage dice).
text | In the heat of the battle, the Pokemon gets carried away, relishing in its own power.

title: Power Whip
contents: text | The Pokemon violently lashes the foe with its vines or a part of its body, acting as a powerful whip.

title: Power-Up Punch
contents: property | Added Effect | Fist Based. Increase User's Strength.
text | The Pokemon uses this punch to test the surface of an object. The user toughens up to deal better blows.

title: Precipice Blades
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Ranged. -2 Accuracy.
text | Giant blades emerge from the earth with every step of the user. If you fall into them, they are almost impossible to survive.

title: Present
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll dice with a 50-50 chance of dealing 2 set damage to the target or recovering 2 HP to the target. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user approaches its foe and gives it a lovely present that may be nice or may be a prank.

title: Prismatic Laser
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Must Recharge.
text | Through a prism, the user shoots a concentrated laser beam that pierces everything that comes in contact with it. The effort leaves the user mentally exhausted.

title: Protect
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 5. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage this pokemon would receive from a damaging move. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.
text | The user creates an energy shield to deflect a blow. Some Pokemon may even perform an amazing parry to block the incoming attack.

title: Psybeam
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
text | Attack with a beam of psychic energy that hits the mind of the target.

title: Psych Up
contents: property | Added Effect | Copy the Target's Attribute and Trait Modifiers and keep them until the end of the scene.
text | The Pokemon mentalizes itself stronger than anyone. They feel good. They can win. They. Can. Do. This.

title: Psychic Fangs
contents: property | Added Effect | If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen. Reflect) destroy it.
text | The Pokemon bares its fangs to bite the foe, psychic energy begins piercing before the actual fangs make contact.

title: Psychic Terrain
contents: property | Added Effect | For the next 4 Rounds, all Psychic Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. No Pokemon on the ground can use moves with increased Priority.
text | The arena becomes radiated by psychic waves. Everyone begins to think slowly due to the buzz in their heads, making all tasks take more time.

title: Psychic
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.
text | The user's telekinetic force is enough to cause severe harm to their target. This telekinesis is not subtle.

title: Psycho Boost
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon releases an explosion of all of its concentrated psychic power in a devastating explosion, afterwards the user will be extremely tired.

title: Psycho Cut
contents: text | Create blades of psychic energy to tear down foes.

title: Psycho Shift
contents: property | Added Effect | Transfer the User's Status Ailments to the target. The user is now cured.
text | With psychic suggestion, the target feels afflicted by the same status problems as the user.

title: Psyshock
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move is resisted with the Foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense
text | Materialize a psychic wave that pushes the target with real physical force.

title: Psystrike
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move is resisted with the Foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense
text | Through sheer psychic power, the user materializes its energy to deal a heavy strike to its foe.

title: Psywave
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank. 3 dice at Amateur Rank. 4 Dice at Ace Rank. 5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.
text | Releases the inner power of the mind to emanate psychic waves that hurt the target.

title: Punishment
contents: property | Added Effect | Add up to 7 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Increased Attribute the foe has. (ie. Foe has 1 Increased dice in Dexterity & Strength that equals +2 Dice on the Damage Pool of this attack).
text | The user takes advantage of its foe's strengths to use them against it.

title: Purify
contents: property | Added Effect | Heal a Target's Status Ailment. If you do then the user may heal 1 HP.
text | The Pokemon is covered by a gelatinous goo that can be used to treat several ailments, the Pokemon also uses it as a source of nourishment.

title: Pursuit
contents: property | Added Effect | If the foe is Switching Out or escaping. Add 2 Dice to the Damage Pool and Priority 1 to this move.
text | The Pokemon chases the foe to deliver a final blow before it escapes.

title: Pyro Ball
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon lights a heavy stone on fire and kicks it while it's ablaze. The hit is pretty heavy already, the fire is just for showing off.

title: Quash
contents: property | Added Effect | For the rest of the scene, the target will go last in the order of Initiative.
text | The user represses the foe with intimidation so it has to think twice before acting.

title: Quick Attack
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 1. Double the Pokemon's movement speed.
text | An attack as fast as lightning.

title: Quick Guard
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 3. Shield Move. This move will only protect against Damaging Moves with "Priority". Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. Negate the effects of support moves that target the User and Allies.
text | The user reacts instinctively and defends itself and its teammates, nullifying the effects of the fastest attacks.

title: Quiver Dance
contents: property | Added Effect | Increases Dexterity, Special, and Sp. Defense.
text | A mystical and beautiful dance that boosts a Pokemon's dexterity and focus.

title: Rage Powder
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 2. During this Round, all damage moves from any foe must target the User.
text | The Pokemon releases an irritating powder that annoys and enrages foes into attacking.

title: Rage
contents: property | Added Effect | If the Pokemon receives damage after using this move. Increase the User's Strength. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
text | The user gets angry and throws a tantrum at the foe. If the attacker keeps on fighting, it will make the user rage even harder.

title: Rain Dance
contents: property | Added Effect | Rain Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
text | The user performs a curious mystic dance that summons a heavy rainfall.

title: Rapid Spin
contents: property | Added Effect | Remove Entry Hazards (Spikes, Stealth Rock, etc.) and Leech Seed from the user's side of the field. Increase user's Dexterity.
text | The Pokemon spins swiftly to strike the foe. Anything near will be scattered around.

title: Razor Leaf
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. High Critical.
text | The Pokemon shoots one or more sharp leaves that cut through all targets as if they were razors.

title: Razor Shell
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense.
text | The Pokemon uses its sharp shell as a weapon to cut the target's fur, armor or anything protecting its body.

title: Razor Wind
contents: property | Added Effect | High Critical. Charge.
text | A sharp wind current is unleased against anyone standing against this Pokemon.

title: Recover
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. May cure Lethal Damage.
text | The Pokemon concentrates on restoring its own cells faster than anything imaginable.

title: Recycle
contents: property | Added Effect | The Pokemon reuses an Item that has already been spent. (Berries etc.) An Item may not be recycled more than 5 times.
text | One Pokemon's trash is another one's treasure.

title: Reflect Type
contents: property | Added Effect | The Pokemon is now the same type of one of its foes. Lasts for a Scene or until this move is used again.
text | The Pokemon appears to change its own physiology. This effect changes the Type of the user to match another Pokemon in sight.

title: Reflect
contents: property | Added Effect | User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Physical Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating invisible walls and floors that prevent the passing of objects.

title: Refresh
contents: property | Added Effect | The User cure itself from Poison, Burn, or Paralysis.
text | The Pokemon takes a few seconds to cool down and get back in the game.

title: Relic Song
contents: property | Added Effect | Sound Based. Roll 1 Die to put the foe to Sleep. If successful, the User may choose to change its form afterwards.
text | The user sings and dances to a melody so beautiful you won't notice you were crying while listening to it.

title: Rest
contents: property | Added Effect | Complete Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. The User must Sleep for a whole Round (from Round Start to Round End).
text | The user falls asleep. During this period the body benefits from a super accelerated healing process.

title: Retaliate
contents: property | Added Effect | If an ally fainted during this or the last Round, add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool. This effect can only be used once per Ally.
text | A powerful attack. It will be even stronger if the user just suffered a great loss.

title: Return
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User.
text | If the Pokemon is treated with care and love, it will return that affection by giving all it's got in battle.

title: Revelation Dance
contents: property | Added Effect | This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.
text | The Pokemon performa a dance. The dance's energy influences the Type of this Move.

title: Revenge
contents: property | Added Effect | If the User has already received damage this round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
text | The Pokemon fights ruthlessly and may retaliate fiercely against a foe that has hurt the user.

title: Reversal
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 Dice may be added this Way.
text | The user gathers its mettle to block away the pain and focus on hitting harder.

title: Roar Of Time
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. If successful, the target can't have any action until next Round. -1 Accuracy.
text | Through a terrifying roar, Dialga bounds the forces of time on a single area, the unfortunate target will be trapped in a time warp, growing old in a matter of seconds.

title: Roar
contents: property | Added Effect | Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends. In an official fight, the Pokemon switches out. If its the last or only Pokemon the move fails. Switcher Move.
text | A mighty roar that scares the foe.

title: Rock Blast
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon shoots and throws small rock pebbles that burst into tiny pieces as they touch the foe.

title: Rock Climb
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Outside of battle it may be used to climb with ease. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user climbs on top of the foe. This may be confusing for some Pokemon.

title: Rock Polish
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase User's Dexterity by 2.
text | The user polishes the rough ends of its rock body for easier and faster movement.

title: Rock Slide
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch those affected. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon creates a slide of falling rocks against its foes that may leave them crushed below the rubble.

title: Rock Smash
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Defense.
text | A powerful hit that can crush rocks. Used against a foe it is sure to leave an awful bruise and a crack on its armor.

title: Rock Throw
contents: text | The user picks up a rock or pebble and throws it at the foe.

title: Rock Tomb
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Reduce Foe's Dexterity. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon covers the foe in gravel and rocks, leaving it unable to move freely.

title: Rock Wrecker
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Must Recharge. Lethal. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user shoots a huge boulder as if it were a cannon ball that can even go through thick walls. This, however, requires a lot of energy from the user.

title: Role Play
contents: property | Added Effect | Copy the target's Ability. The abilities Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, and Plot Device cannot be copied.
text | The user mimics the target and takes on the most basic features from that character.

title: Rolling Kick
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user spins in the air landing an impressive kick that may daze the target.

title: Rollout
contents: property | Added Effect | Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Rollout hit the user performs. If the Pokemon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user curls up into a ball and starts rolling towards its foe, trampling everything in its way.

title: Roost
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. Until the User's next action this Pokemon will be vulnerable to Ground Type moves.
text | The Pokemon uses its action to land on the ground and relax.

title: Rototiller
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the Strength and Special of all Grass Type Pokemon in the battlefield.
text | The Pokemon digs around and moves the soil to make it ideal for plant growth.

title: Round
contents: property | Added Effect | If the User and an Ally are able to use Round, then both may choose to do it at the same time. If they do, both Pokemon add 3 Dice to the Damage Roll.
text | The user attacks the foe with a song. If a teammate joins the song the attack will be stronger.

title: Run Away
contents: property | Added Effect | The User runs away from the battlefield. This effect ends the battle. Foes might try to prevent this by rolling: Dexterity + Athletic and scoring the same or more successes. If the user is Blocked this Maneuver fails.

title: Sacred Fire
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Roll 5 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the Foe.
text | A blazing pillar of rainbow-colored flames crashes upon the foe, it burns and cleanses the evil from within. Those with a pure heart should not fear for they'll be unharmed.

title: Sacred Sword
contents: property | Added Effect | Ignore any Increases to the foe's Defense.
text | The user slashes its target with a mighty blade that no armor can stop.

title: Safeguard
contents: property | Added Effect | For the next 4 Rounds, the User and its Allies are immune to Status Ailments (Burn. Poison. Sleep. Confuse. Freeze. Paralysis). Lasts 4 Rounds. Previously inflicted Status Ailments remain.
text | The Pokemon creates an energy shield that protects everyone from harm.

title: Sand Attack
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
text | The user shoots some sand into the opponent's eyes.

title: Sand Tomb
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Block. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of every Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon creates a shifting sand pit around the foe, leaving it unable to escape.

title: Sandstorm
contents: property | Added Effect | Sandstorm Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
text | The Pokemon casts a fierce wind that carries millions of rough sand particles.

title: Sappy Seed
contents: property | Added Effect | At the end of the Round, Roll 1 Die of Damage to the foe. Restore 1 HP to the user for every damage dealt this way. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. -1 Accuracy.
text | From a magical bean, the user grows a cute stalk that will attach itself to the nearest target. Once it ingrains, it will grow and grow and grow until it reaches the sky.

title: Scald
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.
text | The user shoots a torrent of boiling water, it may leave the foe sopping with burns.

title: Scary Face
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Dexterity by 2.
text | By making a frightening face, the Pokemon makes others think twice about coming near.

title: Scratch
contents: text | The Pokemon uses its sharp claws to scratch the enemy.

title: Screech
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Defense by 2. Sound Based.
text | The user disrupts the fighting stance of its foe by sending a sharp sound to the foe's ears.

title: Searing Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. All Foes in Range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 those Affected.
text | The User torches everything around itself in a sudden burst of scarlet flames. Everything is brought to cinders in a matter of seconds.

title: Secret Power
contents: property | Added Effect | Inflicts abnormal effects. See Secret Power p.432 for more info.
text | This move absorbs the energy around the user. It may unleash that power in unexpected ways.

title: Secret Sword
contents: property | Added Effect | Apply the foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense to resist Damage from this Move
text | An invisible wave cuts through the target, you can feel its sharp edge but you cannot see it.

title: Seed Bomb
contents: text | The user throws a big seed that explodes on contact with the foe.

title: Seed Flare
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Roll 4 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense by 2.
text | Shaymin releases an explosion of pollen and seeds that the foe cannot shake off, leaving it vulnerable. Over time, these seeds will grow into gigantic trees of life.

title: Seismic Toss
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank.  3 dice at Amateur Rank.  4 Dice at Ace Rank.  5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.
text | The target gets launched up then falls face first into the ground, the stronger the user the higher the foe will be thrown.

title: Self Destruct
contents: property | Added Effect | After performing the move, the user receives damage equal to its remaining HP.
text | The Pokemon makes use of its ability to blow up parts of its own body in an impressive display of power.

title: Shadow Ball
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.
text | The Pokemon hurls a sphere made of shadow and dark matter to harm the foe.

title: Shadow Bone
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.
text | The bone that this Pokemon uses as a weapon contains a spirit, that spirit may cling onto a victim, creating openings for its master.

title: Shadow Claw
contents: text | Claws become semi-ethereal and are able to briefly pierce armor, hide, skin, and objects so it can strike the target on any weak spot.

title: Shadow Force
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Charge Move. While charging this Move, other Move will not affect the user. If the Target made a Shielding Action, the shield is destroyed and won't have any effect. Damage dealt by this Move cannot be healed for 24 hrs
text | The Pokemon disappears into a dark dimension to strike its foe at the next opportunity. The blow will hurt the target not on their body but directly on their soul.

title: Shadow Punch
contents: property | Added Effect | Fist Based. Never Fail.
text | The Pokemon punches through its own shadow. The attack comes out from the foe's shadows as if it were a portal.

title: Shadow Sneak
contents: text | The user sneaks through darkness and strikes out of the target's shadow. The Pokemon can move freely inside shades as if it were incorporeal.

title: Sharpen
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength.
text | The user cuts down the rough edges of its body to make it as sharp as a razor.

title: Sheer Cold
contents: property | Added Effect | Deal damage to the Target equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal Damage. -5 Accuracy.
text | The user freezes the foe from the inside out. Victims of this attack will need urgent medical attention.

title: Shell Smash
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength, Special, Dexterity by 2. Reduce the User's Defense and Special Defense by 2.
text | By breaking its own shell, the user sacrifices defense in exchange of being free to fight with all its power.

title: Shell Trap
contents: property | Added Effect | Low Priority 3. This Move strikes the next time the user is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical attack.
text | It apparently just buries underground, but secretely the Pokemon prepares its shell to detonate; anyone who steps on it will be blown to pieces.

title: Shift Gear
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength by 1 and Dexterity by 2.
text | The Pokemon has its gears rotate quickly,. Working like a powerful machine.

title: Shock Wave
contents: text | The user quickly releases jolts of electricity that are too fast for many to react.

title: Shore Up
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If performed under Sandstorm weather, this move is a Complete Heal.
text | The Pokemon gathers the sand around itself to restore its body to shape.

title: Signal Beam
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
text | The user emits an intense light that harms the foes and may leave them dazed like moths.

title: Silver Wind
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase User's Strength. Dexterity. Special. Defense. Sp. Defense.
text | The Pokemon blows a beautiful silver colered wind that harms the foe, the performance may give the user a big confidence boost.

title: Simple Beam
contents: property | Added Effect | Target Pokemon ability is now "Simple".
text | The Pokemon sends a small psychic wave to its target, giving it a simpler point of view about the world.

title: Sing
contents: property | Added Effect | Inflict Sleep on the target. Sound Based. -3 Accuracy.
text | With a charming song, the user lulls its foe to sleep.

title: Sizzly Slide
contents: property | Added Effect | If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. Burn the Foe.
text | The user slides on the floor as if it was ice-skating, only there is no ice, only a raging fire.

title: Sketch
contents: property | Added Effect | Permanently copies a move the target used. Once Copied "Sketch" disappears.
text | The Pokemon draws its foe performing a move. It learns how to perform that move in the process.

title: Skill Swap
contents: property | Added Effect | Switch Abilities with the foe. The abilities Flower Gift. Illusion. Imposter. Stance Change. Wonder Guard. Plot Device and others cannot be switched.
text | The user swaps its identity with the target, making both feel like they are from each other's species.

title: Skull Bash
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Defense. Charge.
text | The Pokemon withdraws to its shell then charges against the foe.

title: Sky Attack
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. High Critical. Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon darts from the sky with a graceful and lethal strike, propelling with the wind, crushing the foe to the ground.

title: Sky Drop
contents: property | Added Effect | Charge Move. While charging this move the Target is flinched. Flying Type Pokemon are immune to the Damage of this move. Lifting a target is restricted by the Strength of the User.
text | The user carries the opponent to the sky, then drops the target from that altitude.

title: Sky Uppercut
contents: text | The user attacks with an uppercut, throwing the foe skyward with lots of force.

title: Slack Off
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate.
text | The Pokemon gets lazy and loafs around instead of fighting. This makes up for a short rest.

title: Slam
contents: text | The user slams the foe with its tail, vines, etc. to deal a decent amount of damage.

title: Slash
contents: property | Added Effect | High Critical. Lethal.
text | Using parts of its body as a blade the Pokemon pierces and tears the foe with a vicious force.

title: Sleep Powder
contents: property | Added Effect | Put the Target to Sleep. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user scatters powder around, anyone who comes in contact with it will fall asleep.

title: Sleep Talk
contents: property | Added Effect | While this Pokemon is asleep, it may use one of its Moves at random.
text | After falling asleep, the Pokemon is still dreaming about the fight.

title: Sludge Bomb
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
text | The user hurls a ball of toxic sludge that explodes on contact and covers the target.

title: Sludge Wave
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison those affected.
text | The Pokemon creates a large wave of watery ooze that soaks everything around. The smell is really unpleasant.

title: Sludge
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
text | The foe is covered with a disgusting sludge, the fumes and toxins on it can make anyone feel sick.

title: Smack Down
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Remove the foe's Immunity to Ground-Type Attacks.
text | The user hurls a projectile, usually a heavy rock that sends the foe down to the ground, leaving it unable to take off the ground afterwards.

title: Smart Strike
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Never Fail.
text | The user stabs the foe using one of its sharp horns with astounding precision, the resulting wound will be very deep and must be treated immediately.

title: Smelling Salts
contents: property | Added Effect | If the Target is Paralyzed, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool of this Move. After dealing damage, cure the target's Paralysis.
text | The Pokemon throws some volatile salts onto the foe's face. A paralyzed Pokemon will get a strong smell.

title: Smog
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 4 Chance Dice Poison the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases.

title: Smokescreen
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
text | The user convers its foe with a cloud of smoke. Some Pokemon hide inside this screen while others use it as a cover to escape.

title: Snap Trap
contents: property | Added Effect | Target is Blocked for the Next 4 Rounds.
text | The user is so flat that you can barely see it in the tall grass, it is just waiting for its foe to get close enough to use its body as a snare trap.

title: Snarl
contents: property | Added Effect | Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special.
text | The Pokemon viciously snarls showing its teeth. Its menacing look will make the foe cower in fear.

title: Snatch
contents: property | Added Effect | Erase any Increase or Decrease on the foe's Traits, and place them on the User instead.
text | The user analyzes the advantages of the foe then makes them their own.

title: Snipe Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | High Critical. Ignore effects from Moves or Abilities that would prevent this Move from targeting a foe.
text | The User Shoots a piercing water jet with incredible precision.

title: Snore
contents: property | Added Effect | This move can only be used if the user asleep. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Sound Based Move.
text | After falling asleep the user lets out a powerful snore, disrupting any focus the foe had.

title: Soak
contents: property | Added Effect | Change the target's Type to Water.
text | The user shoots a stream of water and moisture that clings to the foe's body as an overcoat.

title: Soft Boiled
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate.
text | The user boils a freshly layed egg and restores Health with the energy stored within.

title: Solar Beam
contents: property | Added Effect | Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.
text | The user focuses the sunlight it has absorbed into a powerful and devastating beam of light.

title: Solar Blade
contents: property | Added Effect | Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.
text | The Pokemon focuses the sunlight on its sharp leaves, then releases the energy with a shattering block.

title: Sonic Boom
contents: property | Added Effect | This moves always inflicts 1 damage.
text | The Pokemon attacks with a small destructive shock that can go through armor, thick hide, or walls to deal some damage.

title: Spacial Rend
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. High Critical.
text | With a flicker of its claws, Palkia defragments the space around its foe. Those who survive rarely do peserve their original shape.

title: Spark
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
text | The user tackles the foe, releasing a powerful spark on contact.

title: Sparkling Aria
contents: property | Added Effect | Sound Based. Area Attack. If an affected Pokemon had any of the Burn Status Conditions, heal it instead of dealing damage.
text | The Pokemon sings a beautiful melody, the song comes out as a sparkling fountain, bursting upon impact and quenching any fire in its path.

title: Sparkly Swirl
contents: property | Added Effect | If successful, heal any Status Ailment on the User and Allies. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon unleashes a swirling and glittery energy that releases a pleasant aroma that soothes the body and has healing properties.

title: Spectral Thief
contents: property | Added Effect | If successful, BEFORE the user deals damage with this Move, steal all Attribute Increases the foe may have. Reduced Attributes on the foe remain.
text | Through the shadows, the user sneaks on its target to steal its life force and consume it, leaving the victim with a sense of grief and loss.

title: Speed Swap
contents: property | Added Effect | Switch your Dexterity with your Foe.
text | The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent perceive events as if they were happening faster or slower according to the user's own speed.

title: Spider Web
contents: text | The User quietly releases a web on the field. All foes will be trapped.

title: Spike Cannon
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Successive Actions.
text | The Pokemon shoots a wave of pointy projectiles at the foe.

title: Spikes
contents: property | Added Effect | Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield will lose 1 HP, this effect does not stack. Pokemon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokemon are immune to this effect. Entry Hazard.
text | The Pokemon shoots pointy pebbles or thorns around the field that deal damage to anyone coming from that side.

title: Spiky Shield
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 3. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage from the next attack and deal 2 Damage Dice to the attacker if it used a physical non-ranged Move.
text | The Pokemon covers itself with a thorn filled shell, the foe will be damaged if it hits directly into it.

title: Spirit Break
contents: property | Added Effect | If successful, reduce the Foe's Special.
text | Sometimes words hurt a lot more than blows. With this Move the Pokemon deals both.

title: Spirit Shackle
contents: text | While attacking, the user sneakily binds its foe's shadow to the ground, restricting its movement and making it unable to escape.

title: Spit Up
contents: property | Added Effect | Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this move, otherwise it will fail. Lose all Stockpile modifiers.
text | After storing power, the Pokemon spits that energy at the foe. The user returns to its original size.

title: Spite
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Target's Will to 1 point temporarily. Reset any effects it got from spending Will Points.
text | The target feels overwhelmed by feelings of dread.

title: Splash
contents: text | The user just flops splashing some water, this has no effect at all...

title: Splishy Splash
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
text | The Pokemon rides a giant surge of electricity as if surfing. It looks incredibly rad but it is also dangerous, as electricity does not share the same properties of water for safe surfing.

title: Spore
contents: property | Added Effect | Put the Target to Sleep.
text | A powerful somniferous spore that is shot at the target to make it fall asleep.

title: Spotlight
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 3. Foes will target One Ally this turn.
text | The user points a focused light onto one of its allies as if it were on a stage, the ally can't help but catch everyone's attention into itself.

title: Stabilize An Ally
contents: property | Added Effect | The User applies CPR and/or first aid to an unconcious Ally. Target won't receive Lethal Damage each hour anymore. Each Lethal Damage on the Ally reduces 1 Success to the Accuracy Pool of this Maneuver.

title: Stealth Rock
contents: property | Added Effect | Entry Hazard. Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield lose 1 HP. This effect does not stack.
text | The Pokemon hides sharp and point rocks all over the foe's side of the battlefield.

title: Steam Eruption
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to those affected. -1 Accuracy.
text | In less than a second, the sound of steam boiling over a raging engine thunders through the ears of the foe before it is shot through the sky by a scalding geyser.

title: Steamroller
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
text | The user curls up and rolls at full speed to strike the foe. It may leave the target swatted on the ground.

title: Steel Beam
contents: text | A concentrated ray of light that is capable of melting even the thickest steel plates. Unfortunately the user will also have trouble handling this power.

title: Steel Wing
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon uses its sharp feathers as if they were razors.

title: Sticky Web
contents: property | Added Effect | Entry Hazard. Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield get a Dexterity Reduction of 1. Pokemon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokemon are immune to this effect.
text | The Pokemon quickly covers the arena with a sticky web, newly arrived foes will have trouble moving with ease.

title: Stockpile
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.
text | The Pokemon swells up by storing power with its mouth, this makes the user a little more resistant to damage.

title: Stomp
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
text | The Pokemon steps and stomps the foe, the weight may leave the target squashed on the floor.

title: Stomping Tantrum
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this move is the User failed the Accuracy Roll of the last Move it performed.
text | The Pokemon throws a tantrum all over the place, it becomes worse if something has frustrated it earlier.

title: Stone Edge
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. High Critical. Lethal. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user hurls sharp stones at the foe. The speed and weight of the stones deals a severe amount of damage.

title: Stored Power
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Extra Dice of Damage for each Increased attribute the user has (ie. Clefairy has 1 Increased Point in Defense and 1 Evasion. Stored Power will have 2 Extra Dice on the Damage Pool). Up to 7 Dice may be added.
text | This move allows the user to release its power. If the user has any boosts, the damage is increased.

title: Storm Throw
contents: property | Added Effect | If the Accuracy Roll is successful this move becomes a Critical Hit.
text | The user impacts a weak spot with a powerful blow.

title: Strange Steam
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe.
text | The user releases an addictive sweet-smelling steam, do not be fooled as it is toxic and has nasty side-effects.

title: Strength Sap
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Foe's Strength. User Heals HP equal to the Foe's Current Strength Score. Healing in-battle limitations apply.
text | The Pokemon looks for a weak spot on its foe, then feeds on its vital energy. The foe is left feeling feeble.

title: Strength
contents: property | Added Effect | Outside of battle, using this move allows the Pokemon to lift double the normal weight it should be able to.
text | The Pokemon strains its muscles to go beyond their own limits.

title: String Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | Targets All Foes in Range. Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
text | The user shoots a silk string that ties and limits the movement of its foe.

title: Struggle (Physical)
contents: property | Added Effect | The most basic attack. Same move as "Struggle (Special)", the user should use the one with highest stat (Strength/Special).

title: Struggle (Special)
contents: property | Added Effect | The most basic attack. Same move as "Struggle (Physical)", the user should use the one with highest stat (Strength/Special).

title: Struggle Bug
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Special.
text | The Pokemon lays on its back and struggles with the foe, disrupting the foe's concentration.

title: Struggle
contents: property | Added Effect | The most basic attack.

title: Stuff Cheeks
contents: property | Added Effect | User eats its held Berry and gains its effects, afterwards, Increase user's Defense by 2.
text | The Pokemon munches its berry but keeps part of it on its cheeks. Looks adorable but it is actually a survival tactic to survive harsh winters.

title: Stun Spore
contents: property | Added Effect | Paralyze the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | A blow of dust that paralyzes the target on the spot and cramps its muscles.

title: Submission
contents: text | The user recklessly struggles with the foe to pin it to the ground.

title: Substitute
contents: property | Added Effect | Deal 2 Damage to the user and put a decoy with 2 HP with the same Defenses as the user. If the decoy's HP is depleted, it disappears and the user comes back into the fight. Decoy can only be affected by damaging moves.
text | The Pokemon dissapears in a poof of smoke. When the smoke vanishes, an object identical to the user remains in its place to shield it from harm. It looks amazingly real.

title: Sucker Punch
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 1. This move can only be used after the Target rolls a damaging move.
text | While the foe is preparing its attack, the user takes advantage and strikes.

title: Sunny Day
contents: property | Added Effect | Sunny Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
text | The Pokemon will raise the temperature along with the sun, it doesn't work at night, indoors, underground, or underwater.

title: Sunsteel Strike
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. If anything on the foe's side of the field would prevent this move from dealing damage (Pokemon types. Abilities. Shield Moves. Weather. Or Barriers.) ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.
text | You suddenly stop your in tracks as you see a bright and blinding light coming towards you at great speed. You did not see what hit you and then it's all darkness.

title: Super Fang
contents: property | Added Effect | Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 10) rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1 this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon jumps at the foe to crush it with an awful bite.

title: Superpower
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Reduce User's Strength and Defense.
text | The Pokemon makes use of all its force to deliver a crushing strike to the foe, this demands a lot from the user.

title: Supersonic
contents: property | Added Effect | Confuse the foe. -3 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon emits a series of ultrasonic waves that make the foe dizzy and disoriented.

title: Surf
contents: text | A giant wave of water sweeps the area while the user swims on top of it.

title: Swagger
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the foe's Strength by 2. Inflicts Confusion.
text | The Pokemon enrages the foe with its arrogant demeanor, making it lose focus in battle.

title: Swallow
contents: property | Added Effect | Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this Move, otherwise it will fail. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. User restores 2 Health points. Loses the effects of stockpile. The Pokemon must rest an hour before using Swallow again.
text | The Pokemon swallows the energy she was storing to restore some damage, it recovers its normal size afterwards.

title: Sweet Kiss
contents: property | Added Effect | Confuse the foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon moves towards the foe and plants a delicate kiss on its cheek, then leaves playfully. The foe struggles to know what it meant.

title: Sweet Scent
contents: property | Added Effect | Those affected cannot evade moves performed by the user. Attracts wild Pokemon if used outside of battle.
text | The Pokemon releases an aroma that its enemies will love.

title: Swift
contents: text | The user shoots a star shaped light beam that hits the target at blinding speed.

title: Switcheroo
contents: property | Added Effect | User and Foe switch their Held Item. If only one Pokemon is holding an item it gives it away.
text | The user quickly switches the held items before the foe can realize what happened.

title: Swords Dance
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength by 2.
text | The Pokemon makes a dance that raises its battle spirit.

title: Synchronoise
contents: property | Added Effect | Sound Based. Choose a Type (Fire, Poison, Steel, etc.) this move only affects those with that Type.
text | The user vibrates with any particular energy Type he chooses. All nearby creatures and objects of that Type are hurt.

title: Synthesis
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If Successful spend 1 Will point to activate. If performed under Sunny weather this Move is a Complete Heal. If Rain/Sandstorm Weather is in effect this move only heals 1 HP.
text | The Pokemon uses the sunlight as energy to regain its vitality.

title: Tackle
contents: text | A basic attack that consists of charging at an enemy.

title: Tail Glow
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Special by 3.
text | The user emits a strong light. This Pokemon will stare at its brightness to enter a trance.

title: Tail Slap
contents: property | Added Effect | Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon slaps the foe's face with its strong tail.

title: Tail Whip
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Defense.
text | The Pokemon moves its tail in such a cute way that the foe will easily let its guard down.

title: Tailwind
contents: property | Added Effect | For the Next 4 Rounds, Increase the Dexterity of the User and All Allies in the field by 2.
text | User flaps its wings and casts a turbulent wind that helps the team move significantly faster.

title: Take Down
contents: text | The Pokemon recklessly grapples the foe to smash it on the ground.

title: Tar Shot
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Dexterity. Until the end of the Scene Fire Type Moves will deal Super-Effective damage against the foe.
text | The Pokemon gushes a blob of black tar over its foe. The unfortunate voctim can barely move afterwards, keep it away from fire sources, tar is extrmely flammable.

title: Taunt
contents: property | Added Effect | The target Pokemon can only perform Damaging Moves and Evasion actions for the next 4 Rounds.
text | The user mocks and teases the target to make it attack in a raging fury.

title: Tearful Look
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Foe's Strength and Special.
text | The Pokemon's eyes start watering as if it were about to cry, it's foe is moved by the tears and loses its will to fight.

title: Teatime
contents: property | Added Effect | Those affected eat their held berries without gaining their effects. Outside of battle will diffuse violent intentions for a few minutes
text | The Pokemon gathers everyone for a cup of delicious tea. Not eating a snack along with it would be a waste.

title: Techno Blast
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. If Genesect is performing this Move, this Move's type may change to: Fire, Ice, Water, or Electric depending on the Driver it has as Held Item.
text | A laser briefly beams away from the Pokemon, whatever it hits explodes a second later. This move can be modified with the right programming of a computer.

title: Teeter Dance
contents: text | The user starts dancing around with wobbly movements. Friends and foes will get dizzy by trying to follow it.

title: Telekinesis
contents: property | Added Effect | All attacks against the target have "Never Fail". The target is immune to Ground Moves. Lasts 2 Rounds.
text | The user can manipulate objects and creatures with his mind. Pokemon and humans become easier to hit because their movements are restrained.

title: Teleport
contents: property | Added Effect | In the wild, the battle ends. In official battles, it counts as the Pokemon being recalled. Teleportation distances depend on Special and Storyteller's discretion.
text | Teleport the user and one more creature to a place of tranquility and high psychic resonance such as Pokemon Centers. Ceilings and walls block this move from working.

title: Thief
contents: property | Added Effect | The user steals the foe's Held Item.
text | The Pokemon strikes its foe and takes the opportunity to steal whatever the target was holding.

title: Thousand Arrows
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Ranged. All Foes in Range. If successful, Flying and Levitating Pokemon can be hit by Ground-Type Moves for the rest of the scene.
text | Out of nowhere, pointy shards come raining from the sky towards the foes, even flying creatures will fall to the ground if they are knocked by them. Take cover, this is gonna hurt.

title: Thousand Waves
contents: property | Added Effect | Blocks. Ranged. All Foes in Range.
text | Solid ground becomes a sandtrap, cracked earth will close to ensnare your feet. It's as it the land itself wanted to trap you. There is no attacker nor escape in sight.

title: Thrash
contents: text | The Pokemon rampages and starts to attack and destroy everything on its path.

title: Throat Chop
contents: property | Added Effect | The target cannot use any "Sound Based" Move for the rest of the scene.
text | A heinous attack to a Pokemon's throat that will leave them unable to make a sound for hours.

title: Thunder Fang
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
text | The user lands an electrified bite on the foe. The direct current may affect the foe greatly.

title: Thunder Punch
contents: property | Added Effect | Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe.
text | An Electrified punch to deal a shocking blow.

title: Thunder Shock
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
text | A small electric attack that shocks the foe and may leave it with muscular cramps. Some electric devices hit by this attack will malfunction.

title: Thunder Wave
contents: property | Added Effect | Paralyze the foe. -1 Accuracy.
text | A tide of bright lightning streams from the floor onto the foe. The target's body will be cramped for hours.

title: Thunder
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe. If performed under Sunny Weather, Accuracy becomes -3 instead. If performed under Rain Weather, Ignore this Moves Reduced Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.

title: Thunderbolt
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
text | A strong electric attack that shocks and harms the foe. It can destroy most kinds of electric equipment.

title: Tickle
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the foe's Strength and Defense.
text | The Pokemon tickles the foe. The laughter really disturbs the foe's fighting stance.

title: Topsy-Turvy
contents: property | Added Effect | Any Decreases on the foe's Attributes become Increases and vice versa.
