text | The user changes the nature of its target, bad things become good and good things become bad.

title: Torment
contents: property | Added Effect | The target cannot use the same Moves it used during the last Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | The user torments and enrages the foe, making it unable to keep using its strategy.

title: Toxic Spikes
contents: property | Added Effect | Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield become Poisoned. Roll 1 Chance Dice for the Poison to become Badly Poisoned instead. Entry Hazard.
text | The user lays a trap of scattered poison spikes that attach to the opponent's feet leaving them with a bad case of fever.

title: Toxic Thread
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Foe's Dexterity. Poison the Foe.
text | The user shoots a sticky thread that entangles around the foe, the thread is also laced with a potent toxin that will poison the foe on contact.

title: Toxic
contents: property | Added Effect | Badly Poison the Foe. -1 Accuracy.
text | With a disgusting diet and training, the user learns how to turn its fluids into a deadly toxin.

title: Transform
contents: property | Added Effect | The user transforms into a copy of its target with same Ability, Attributes, Trait Modifiers, and Moves. Being inside a Pokeball breaks the Transformation.
text | The user modifies its own DNA structure to become an identical clone of any Pokemon or object it can see.

title: Tri Attack
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.
text | The user shoots three beams. Each one is charged with a different kind of energy.

title: Trick Room
contents: property | Added Effect | Invert the order of Initiative. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | This reality altering move can manipulate time, so slow creatures are fast, and fast creatures are slow.

title: Trick-Or-Treat
contents: property | Added Effect | Add the Ghost type to Target's Type. (ie. Meowth will now by Normal/Ghost Charizard will now be Fire/Flying/Ghost) If the Pokemon already has a third type attached, replace it.
text | The Pokemon takes the target Trick-or-Treating. The target gets a ghost costume which somehow cannot be removed without a medium's help.

title: Trick
contents: property | Added Effect | The foe and the user swap Held Items.
text | Control the target's mind to perform a simple non-hostile action, such as walking or handling an item.

title: Triple Kick
contents: property | Added Effect | Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to Damage Pool to the last kick performed. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user throws three or more kicks, leaving the harder blow for the end.

title: Trop Kick
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce Foe's Strength.
text | The user strikes with an intense and alluring kick.

title: Trump Card
contents: property | Added Effect | If User's Will is half spent add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll. If the User's Will is depleted add +8 to the Damage Pool.
text | The more exhausted the user is, the stronger this attack will become. When the Pokemon is at the last of its strength this move can be devastating.

title: Twineedle
contents: property | Added Effect | Double action. Ranged. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe per hit.
text | The Pokemon stabs the foe with its stinger, claws or spikes infused with poison.

title: Twister
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foes.
text | The Pokemon lets out a spiral current that surrounds the foes. They can't move until they free themselves from this terrible whirlwind.

title: U-Turn
contents: property | Added Effect | The user switches out after dealing damage. The replacement Pokemon arrives to ready to fight. Roll its initiative Switcher Move.
text | The user strikes its foe, then quickly goes back to safety while another party Pokemon takes its place.

title: Uproar
contents: property | Added Effect | For the rest of the Round, no Pokemon can fall asleep. If a Pokemon was asleep it wakes up. Sound Based Move.
text | The Pokemon shouts and screams and squaks so hard the noise really hurts the ears. Nobody could get a full night of sleep with all that ruckus.

title: V-Create
contents: property | Added Effect | Reduce the user's Dexterity, Defense, and Sp. Defense.
text | The user slams its foe with a V-Shaped flame on its forehead. Upon impact, it detonates a terrible explosion and leaves the user pretty vulnerable afterwards.

title: Vacuum Wave
contents: text | The user pulls the enemy closer using the power of its ki. This traction has a lot of strength and may break anything it pulls.

title: Veevee Volley
contents: property | Added Effect | Add 1 Die to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
text | Long sessions playing Volley ball with your Pokemon make it very happy. During battle, it just replaces the ball with its foe.

title: Venom Drench
contents: property | Added Effect | If an affected foe is poisoned or becomes poisoned in the same Round you used this Move then Reduce its Strength, Special, and Dexterity.
text | Foes are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid that targets their weakened immune systems.

title: Venoshock
contents: property | Added Effect | If the Foe is already poisoned, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
text | The Pokemon shoots a special kind of toxin that reacts violently if the foe is already weakened with poison.

title: Vice Grip
contents: text | The Pokemon traps the foe with its pincers or jaws and applies pressure that will leave a nasty bruise.

title: Vine Whip
contents: text | They Pokemon uses its slender vines as a whip against the foe. They are as long as 20 feet.

title: Vital Throw
contents: property | Added Effect | Low Priority 1. Never Fail.
text | The Pokemon awaits for the perfect moment to strike the foe.

title: Volt Switch
contents: property | Added Effect | The user switches out after dealing damage. The new Pokemon arrives ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.
text | The User quickly shoots an electic jolt, then switches places with an awaiting Pokemon partner at the speed of lightning.

title: Volt Tackle
contents: property | Added Effect | Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.
text | The user surrounds itself with big bolts of electricity, then it crashes against the foe.

title: Wake-Up Slap
contents: property | Added Effect | If the Foe is sleeping, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool. The foe Wakes up afterwards.
text | A powerful slap that makes even the laziest Pokemon be well awake.

title: Water Gun
contents: text | The user learns to shoot water with enough force to hurt the foe.

title: Water Pledge
contents: property | Added Effect | Creates a rainbow that adds 2 Dice to all Chance Dice rolls. This effect lasts 4 turns.
text | The Pokemon chants to invoke the power of Water. Moisture in the air bends the light to create an inspiring rainbow. Everyone in the field is sure to give its best.

title: Water Pulse
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
text | The Pokemon attacks with a pulsing blast of water, this leaves the foe feeling dizzy.

title: Water Shuriken
contents: property | Added Effect | Ranged. Priority 1. Successive Actions.
text | The Pokemon quickly throws sharp jets of water in the shape of a shuriken.

title: Water Sport
contents: property | Added Effect | For the next 4 Rounds Fire Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.
text | The user soaks the battlefield with moisture, making it harder for fire attacks to ignite.

title: Water Spout
contents: property | Added Effect | Remove 1 Dice of Damage for every missing HP of the User. Up to 5 Dice may be reduced this way.
text | The Pokemon builds up an amazing pressure and releases a huge columnar vortex of water that could even reach the clouds.

title: Waterfall
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
text | The Pokemon may swim with such strength that it may even swim upwards in a waterfall.

title: Weather Ball
contents: property | Added Effect | If the battlefield is under a Weather, add +2 to the Damage Roll and change the Type of the Move accordingly: Sun-Fire. Rain-Water. Hail-Ice. Sandstorm-Rock. Wind-Flying.
text | The user creates a ball of energy that will use the climate around it to grow in size and power.

title: Whirlpool
contents: property | Added Effect | Block. Deal 2 dice of damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
text | Trap the foe inside a violent swirling whirlpool that makes the foe unable to escape the battle.

title: Whirlwind
contents: property | Added Effect | Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends. In an official fight, the Pokemon switches out. If it's the last or only Pokemon the move fails. Switcher Move.
text | The Pokemon creates a powerful wind current that swirls the enemy around and sends it flying away.

title: Wide Guard
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 3. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage the User and Allies would receive from a damaging move. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the User and Allies would take.
text | The Pokemon uses its whole body to provide coverage and protection to its allies against an incoming attack.

title: Wild Charge
contents: text | The Pokemon surrounds itself with wild botls of lightning, then tackles recklessly.

title: Will-O-Wisp
contents: property | Added Effect | Burn the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
text | The user calls a floating ember to consume the foe.

title: Wing Attack
contents: text | The user flies towards the foe and strikes with its wings.

title: Wish
contents: property | Added Effect | Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. The move has its effect at the beginning of the next round.
text | The Pokemon makes a wish with all its might and somehow it becomes true.

title: Withdraw
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase User's Defense.
text | The user hides inside its hard shell to protect itself from incoming attacks.

title: Wonder Room
contents: property | Added Effect | Defense and Sp. Defense will be calculated with Insight instead of Vitality. Lasts 4 Rounds.
text | Inside the Wonder Room, a strong mind makes a strong body and a resilient body makes a resilient mind. However, if the mind is weak, the body will be weak and vice-versa.

title: Wood Hammer
contents: text | The Pokemon recklessly slams the foe with a part of its rugged body, the user also gets hurt in the process.

title: Work Up
contents: property | Added Effect | Increase the User's Strength and Special.
text | The Pokemon excercises with vigor to be physically and mentally prepared for battle.

title: Worry Seed
contents: property | Added Effect | Until the end of the Scene. Target's Ability is now "Insomnia".
text | The user plants a seed in its foe. It causes a restless preoccupation that won't let it sleep at night.

title: Wrap
contents: property | Added Effect | Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -1 Accuracy.
text | The Pokemon traps its foe with its body or vines, causing some damage.

title: Wring Out
contents: property | Added Effect | Remove 1 Dice from the Damage Roll for every missing HP of the Target. Up to 4 dice may be removed this way.
text | The Pokemon literally squeezes the life out of its target. As life is fading, squeezing will be harder.

title: X-Scissor
contents: text | The Pokemon uses its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors to cut through the foe.

title: Yawn
contents: property | Added Effect | If the target is not removed from battle by the start of its next Round, it will fall asleep.
text | The user lets out an infectious yawn that will make anyone drowsy enough to fall asleep pretty soon.

title: Zap Cannon
contents: property | Added Effect | Lethal. Paralyze the Foe. -3 Accuracy.
text | The user hurls a dreadful bombardment of electric explosions. Anyone hit won't be able to move for a very long time.

title: Zen Headbutt
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. -1 Accuracy.
text | The user focuses its will on its head to strike with a headbutt.

title: Zing Zap
contents: property | Added Effect | Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
text | The user hurls itself as a zig-zaging ball of electricity that explodes on contact, this leaves the foe unable to move for a few seconds.

title: Zippy Zap
contents: property | Added Effect | Priority 2. This Move is always a Critical Hit and gets the proper Bonus for it. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
text | The user zips and zaps from one place to another to strike the foe moving so fast it appears to be teleporting, leaving almost no time to react.
